description: This Python source file implements OAuth 2.0 flow handling for Atlassian integration within a FastAPI application. It provides endpoints for initiating OAuth login with PKCE, handling OAuth callback to exchange authorization codes for tokens, and diagnostics for debugging OAuth states. The code manages in-memory or Redis storage for OAuth state and session data, and uses environment variables for configuration.

classes.name: SessionData
classes.description: Data structure representing session information, including state, code_verifier, and tokens.

methods.name: bool _is_absolute_url(url: str | None)
methods.description: Checks if a URL string is an absolute URL with HTTP or HTTPS scheme.

methods.name: str _encode_message(message: str)
methods.description: URL encodes a message string for safe inclusion in query parameters.

methods.name: str _mask_state(state: str)
methods.description: Creates a masked string representation of a state for logging purposes.

methods.name: oauth_atlassian_login(request: Request, return_url: Optional[str] = None, scope: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Initiates the OAuth login flow by generating PKCE challenge and state, storing session data, and redirecting to Atlassian authorization URL.

methods.name: oauth_atlassian_callback(request: Request, code: Optional[str] = None, state: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Handles OAuth callback by validating state, exchanging code for tokens, and redirecting back to the return URL.

methods.name: oauth_diagnostics()
methods.description: Provides debug information about OAuth state and TTL, for development and troubleshooting.

ctags.name: oauth_atlassian_callback
ctags.pattern: /^async def oauth_atlassian_callback(request: Request, code: Optional[str] = None, state: Optional/
ctags.signature: (request: Request, code: Optional[str] = None, state: Optional[str] = None)

ctags.name: oauth_atlassian_login
ctags.pattern: /^async def oauth_atlassian_login(request: Request, return_url: Optional[str] = None, scope: Optio/
ctags.signature: (request: Request, return_url: Optional[str] = None, scope: Optional[str] = None)
